Package controllers

Class BookingController

Object
BookingController
public class BookingController extends Object
This Booking Controller for manipulating data in "movies.txt" database.
Since:
2022-11-11
Version:
1.0
Author:
Liu Woon Kit

  • Method Details

    • search

      public ArrayList<Movie> search(String query)
      Scans through movies.txt, finding matches for the query. If matches, it is collected to an array. Once done, returns the resultant matches.
      Parameters:
      query - The query to be searched against
      Returns:
      The array of results

    • book

      public boolean book(Ticket ticket)
      Adds the ticket in the "tickets.txt" database.
      Parameters:
      ticket - The ticket to be added to the database
      Returns:
      The booking status

    • getCinemaIdsWithMovie

      public ArrayList<Integer> getCinemaIdsWithMovie(int movieId)
      Takes in a movie ID, which searches the "showTimes.txt", retrieving the list of cineplexes that is screening the movie
      Parameters:
      movieId - The id of the movie
      Returns:
      The list of cineplex IDs

    • getShowTimes

      public ArrayList<ShowTime> getShowTimes(int cinemaId, int movieId)
      Takes in a movie ID and cineplex ID, which searches the "showTimes.txt", retrieving the list of movie time slots at that particular cineplex.
      Parameters:
      cinemaId - The id of the cineplex
      movieId - The id of the movie
      Returns:
      The list of show times

    • getSeatAvailability

      public String[][] getSeatAvailability(int cimeaID, int movieID, Date showTime)
      Takes in a movie ID, cineplex ID, show time Searches for tickets that has the same cinema ID, movie ID and show time. Populates a 2D array with the seat number of the matching tickets.
      Parameters:
      cinemaId - The id of the cineplex
      movieId - The id of the movie
      showTime - The time slot of the movie
      Returns:
      The 2D representation of the seats status

    • getTopFiveByTicketSales

      public Stream<Map.Entry<Integer,Long>> getTopFiveByTicketSales()
      Groups the tickets by movie ID. Sorts the tickets by the number of occurrences.
      Returns:
      The top 5 Movie by sales

    • getTopFivebyRatings

      public ArrayList<Movie> getTopFivebyRatings()
      Sorts the movies by their overall ratings.
      Returns:
      The top 5 Movie by Ratings

    • getBookingHistory

      public ArrayList<Ticket> getBookingHistory(String... query)
      Searches the database for a ticket that has a specific email address and phone number Returns the matching tickets.
      Parameters:
      query - The information to search for
      Returns:
      The List of past booked tickets

    • getMovieById

      public Movie getMovieById(int movieId)
      Searches the database for a specific movie ID. One found, the movie information is then returned
      Parameters:
      movieId - The id of the Movie
      Returns:
      The Movie object

    • parseMovie

      public Movie parseMovie(String input)
      Takes in a string line retrieve from a text file database. Transforms the string into a Movie object using the SEPARATOR
      Parameters:
      input - The string to be parsed
      Returns:
      The parsed Movie object

      Returns:
